name: APE ESCAPE (itch)
description:
This is an endless runner I made in Unity for my DATT2300 class. This is my first time using Unity so it's rough but I tried my best.

CREDITS:

Music: Itty Bitty 8 bit - Kevin Macleod
Jungle Pack asset - Jesse Munguia
Text Pixel font - Tiny Worlds
Cartoon Ape - Carnivac (Pintrest)
Camera Shake code sample - FTVS (Github Gist)
